overview: After a daring jewel heist, a trio of thieves hold up in an old dark house inhabited by a motley bunch of restless ghosts that only want to dispatch their new guests in the most horrible manner possible – that is if they can get to them before the spirits of an unruly group of dismembered corpses from the nearby cemetery!
tagline: Some nutty gangsters thought they pulled off the crime of the century… but it’s going to cost them an arm and a leg!
title: The Dismembered
